<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Acolyte](/NPCs.aspx?ID=893)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Underling clerics are still learning the tenets of their faith and answer to a superior priest. Their days are spent in devotion and learning, sequestered in temples.

<column gap="tiny">

([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<image src="/images/NPCs/Devotee_Acolyte.png" />
</column>

</row>
